A Garbage Can Lid?
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class, attack and damage rolls.
  • Impact IImpact I: Doubles the critical range for bludgeoning weapons.
  • Bludgeoning 4Bludgeoning 4: The edges of this weapon are blunted, dealing an additional 4d6 bludgeon damage on each hit.
  • Shield Bashing +12Shield Bashing +12: +12 Enhancement bonus to Increased chance of Secondary Shield Bash.
  • Exceptional Healing Amplification +8Healing Amplification: This effect amplifies all incoming positive energy healing by +8 (Exceptional bonus). Includes spells, potions, and other effects.
  • Empty Blue Augment Slot Blue Augments
    • AC: Natural Armor Bonus or Protection (Deflection bonus): +1 to +8
    • ASF reduction: -5% to -15%
    • Fortification: +25% to +100%
    • Golem's Heart
    • Good Luck: +1 or +2
    • Hit points: +5 to +40
    • Max Dex Bonus (Armor): +1 or +2
    • Defense (PRR and MRR): +2 to +16
    • Saves (Resistance bonus): +1 to +8

    • Ability (Insight bonus): +1 or +2

Alchemical Light Shield
  • +5 Enhancement Bonus+5 Enhancement Bonus: +5 enhancement bonus to Armor Class, attack and damage rolls.
  • Alchemical (Prototype)Alchemical (Prototype): This experimental item, crafted and enchanted at ancient Cannith creation forges using powerful alchemy, is made of a material that allows elemental power sources to be bound to it. This item is in a prototype state and is currently in need of refinement before an elemental can be bound to it.

An Inexplicably Legendary Garbage Can Lid?
  • +15 Enhancement Bonus+15 Enhancement Bonus: +15 enhancement bonus to Armor Class, attack and damage rolls.
  • Impact VImpact V: Doubles the critical range for bludgeoning weapons. This weapon deals an additional 2 [W]. In addition, the base critical threat range of this weapon is doubled. This does not stack with the Improved Critical feat.
  • Bludgeoning 9Bludgeoning 9: The edges of this weapon are blunted, dealing an additional 9d6 bludgeon damage on each hit.
  • Shield Bashing +33Shield Bashing +33: +33 Enhancement bonus to Increased chance of Secondary Shield Bash.

Emerald Twilight
  • +8 Enhancement Bonus+8 Enhancement Bonus: +8 enhancement bonus to Armor Class, attack and damage rolls.
  • Riposte VIIRiposte VII: When missed in Melee: Deals 7 to 28 damage to your attacker. Passive: +4 Insight bonus to Armor Class, +3 Insight bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will Saving Throws..
  • GuardbreakingGuardbreaking: This item enables you to break an enemy's guard in between your melee attacks. On critical hits with your melee weapons, enemies will become dazed as a result.
  • Speed XVSpeed XV: Passive: +30% enhancement bonus to movement speed, +15 enhancement bonus to melee and ranged attack speed.
  • Upgradeable - Primary AugmentUpgradeable - Primary Augment: This item can be upgraded to contain a Yellow, Blue or Red (weapons and shields only) augment. Epic Shield of the Demonic Soldier
  • +12 Enhancement Bonus+12 Enhancement Bonus: +12 enhancement bonus to Armor Class, attack and damage rolls.
  • Dazing VIIDazing VII: On Hit: Your target suffers a -1 Penalty to Will Saving Throws for 6 seconds. This effect sacks up to 5 times. This effect may only occur on-hit once every three seconds.
    Passive: The DC of the saving throw to resist your Stunning Blow and Stunning Fist combat feats is increased by 12.
  • Impact VImpact V: Passive: This weapon deals an additional +2[W] damage. In addition, the base critical threat range of this weapon is doubled. This does not stack with Improved Critical feat.
  • Magical Resistance: +2 QualityMagical Resistance: +2 Quality: This item provides a +2 Quality bonus to your Magical Resistance Rating.
